content: stay warm in style with this cozy bramble twist ear warmer a beginner-friendly crochet pattern that combines texture warmth and timeless charm designed with a beautiful bramble-like stitch and an elegant twist front this ear warmer looks stunning in any color of yarn this pattern is worked flat and then joined with a twist for that professional store-bought look perfect for chilly mornings winter walks or as a handmade gift for someone special ________________________________________ ✨ pattern features beginner-friendly and quick to make textured stitch that has loads of texture step-by-step written instructions includes video tutorials for both right- and left-handed crocheters ________________________________________ materials yarn lion brand landscapes #4 medium weight approx 130 yards colors shown cabana and mountain range hook size i 5 5 mm crochet hook tapestry needle scissors tape measure faux leather tag optional for finishing touch ________________________________________ finished sizes measured flat before joining 3 wide × 16 long 4 wide × 18 long 5 wide × 20 long shown fits average adult head 5 wide × 22 long 5 wide × 24 long ________________________________________ why you ll love this pattern uses minimal yarn one skein or less great for stash-busting makes wonderful handmade gifts stylish twisted modern design works up fast under a few hours perfect weekend project looks amazing in both solid and variegated yarns ________________________________________ perfect for craft fairs and market prep holiday gifts and winter accessories beginners looking to expand crochet skills anyone who loves a quick satisfying project
